text:
...I was supposed to eat something
before changing clothes...!

No, no, not at all. It's good that it's not a big problem—
though saying that...

It's bad to stain the costume.
Should I buy something easy to eat?

No, no, that's really not necessary!
I have chocolate for times like this!

Oh...! ...But is it okay to have something
sweet when you're hungry?

I appreciate your concern...! Producer-san,
seems like you understand my preferences...!?

Indeed, it's a bit risky, but
we have to make do with what we have!
